alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 11:54AM EDT until April 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Recent heavy rainfall is resulting in rises on the Patoka River. The river is forecast to reach flood stage Monday morning, then crest on Thursday. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO SUNDAY, APRIL 02... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Sunday, April 02. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 18.8 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, April 02. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
